name: Eric the Anteater and the Interplanetary Rescue
name_original: Eric the Anteater and the Interplanetary Rescue
description:
Eric the Anteater and the Interplanetary Rescue is a retro side-scrolling platformer with a strong emphasis on fighting through hordes of enemies. Features a variety of both environments and foes.

Experience the challenge of eighteen tough levels as you enjoy precise platforming and incredible action. Enjoy original music and sound.

Enemies range from simple enemy drones to powerful, weapon-wielding nemeses. Have fun beating end-of-area bosses.

When not battling to rescue Eric's girlfriend in the game's primary story mode, enjoy wave upon wave of dynamically generated enemy attacks and platforming sections in an arcade-style mode.
